name: Jewel Jive
description:
JEWEL JIVE is the gem matching puzzler for purists! Slide and match tons of jewels in style, obliterate blocks and slay evolving jewel viruses. Join countless others and play the newest match-3 craze NOW!

5/5 - "Seriously one of the best jewel matching games ever!"

• SWAP jewels in 215 epic levels for the adventure of a lifetime!
• PURE gaming, ZERO distraction!
• OUTWIT cunningly designed levels!
• SLAY jewel-munching viruses before they evolve...and multiply!
• TURN THE TIDE with awesome power-ups!
• UNLOCK new episodes for free rewards!
• MUSIC MAGIC by legendary Kevin MacLeod!
• EASY and FUN to play, impossible to master!
• ONLINE or OFFLINE, play whenever and wherever!
• MORE LEVELS and content in future updates!
• FREE to play!

Follow us:
▸ www.facebook.com/JewelJive

Jewel Jive is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.
